Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking through the events: Event 1 starts at 20C, 1 bar, 0 vibration, 0 flow. Then event 2: same machine M1 again, temp 20, vibration 0, flow 0.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let me look at the temperature trends. Lets see: the temperatures go up and down. From event 4 where temp is 50C, then 55, 58, 40 etc.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: considering vibration levels: event 4 has vibration 30, which might indicate some activity.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: when vibration is high, its cutting because that causes more vibration.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: when temperature increases and vibration increases, that might be during operation of cutting. But in event 4 vibration is 30, temp 50.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Temperature and vibration spikes: cutting. Events 4,5,6 high temp and vibration is cutting phase.

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: Alternatively, perhaps when material flow is increasing, its part of assembly. Wait maybe grouping by the possible sensors that correlate with activity steps.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Cutting Metal: high temp and vibration, event4 50C, 30Hz, flow5. Assembling Parts: lower temps, steady flow.
